subject: Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: J. D. Drew smashed a two-run homer off Francisco Rodriguez in the ninth inning, powering the Red Sox past the Angels and giving them a 2-0 lead in the series.
snippet: J. D. Drew smashed a two-run homer off Francisco Rodriguez in the ninth inning, powering the Red Sox past the Angels and giving them a 2-0 lead in the series.
